title: Verify a Viral Social Media Video
description: A dramatic video of an event is going viral. A reporter must verify its authenticity before reporting on it.

tasks.description: Perform a reverse image search on keyframes from the video to see where it first appeared online.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent traces the video back to its original poster.

tasks.description: Analyze the video's metadata for clues about the date and time it was created.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts and analyzes the video's metadata.

tasks.description: Use landmarks, weather, and shadows in the video to geolocate it and confirm it matches the claimed location and time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent corroborates the video's context using external information.

tasks.description: Attempt to contact the original poster to ask for more information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reaches out to the source for direct confirmation.
